author: jorton
msg: CRYPTO_cleanup_all_ex_data here, fixing a per-connection memory leak
which occurs if the client indicates support for a compression
algorithm in the initial handshake, and mod_ssl is linked against
Thanks to Amund Elstad and Dr Stephen Henson for analysis of this

msg: remove property that shouldn't be needed - it was causing ${maven.repo.local} to be created locally as a directory
